meanings.definition: The surgical removal of the appendix.
meanings.sent1: Last week, the doctor performed two appendicectomies at the hospital.
meanings.sent2: The appendicectomies went smoothly without any complications.
meanings.sent3: During the surgery, the appendix tried to hide, but the appendicectomies found it!
meanings.sent4: The appendicectomies were like brave warriors, fearlessly removing the appendix.
meanings.sent5: The appendicectomies saved the day by removing the troublesome appendix.

meanings.sent1: In the medical records, it was noted that she had two appendicectomies in her lifetime.
meanings.sent2: The hospital performed multiple appendicectomies last month.
meanings.sent3: The appendicectomies in the report seemed to multiply like rabbits!
meanings.sent4: The appendicectomies on the list stood out like stars in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The history of her health was marked by several appendicectomies.
